channel.title: Making New server... (need some help : questions inside...)
channel.description:
Sup guys, ok i havent coded in a butt load of time so im comming back and hopefully trying to make my own server.
1st: i need to know how to changed the top of the screen it says "welcome to modscape" (i wanna change that,,,) 2nd: The text in the textbox when you 1st login... the words that popup saying stuff. i need to change that...
i will come up with more later.
If you have MSN or AIM that would be great. Just write it here and i will talk to you on there if you are willing to help me.
Also, if you help me [u]a lot[/u] then you will be granted admin in our server... probably co-owner

alright got it let me find it… im not like a fr00b i know the basics…

item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well search in client.java for

welcome to modscape

Then change it. And do the same with the other one, just search. If you really are new to this and don’t know how to search do ctrl f
